meanings.definition: A small container or vessel, typically used for holding liquids.
meanings.sent1: She poured the milk into the luggie before adding it to the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The bartender handed him a luggie filled with his favorite drink.
meanings.sent3: The tiny luggie was perfect for storing the leftover sauce.
meanings.sent4: The luggie sat on the shelf, waiting to be filled with fresh flowers.
meanings.sent5: He carefully carried the luggie, afraid of spilling its contents.
